Uses of Interface
org.kie.api.logger.KieRuntimeLogger

Packages that use KieRuntimeLogger
org.kie.api.event Drools has a comprehensive event api for all parts of the platform. 
org.kie.api.logger Logger classes use to log the KnowledgeRuntime's execution. 
 

Uses of KieRuntimeLogger in org.kie.api.event
 

Methods in org.kie.api.event that return KieRuntimeLogger
 KieRuntimeLogger KieRuntimeEventManager.getLogger()
          Returns the KieRuntimeLogger registered on this KieRuntimeEventManager if any
 

Uses of KieRuntimeLogger in org.kie.api.logger
 

Methods in org.kie.api.logger that return KieRuntimeLogger
